entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 10.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
